snippet: Since Chabad started an online chametz-buying service out of Crown Heights about a decade ago, an ever growing number of Jews-- 56,843 last year-- have pointed and clicked to give power of attorney over their chametz to Rabbi Yosef Landa, a Chabad...
abstract: Since Chabad started an online chametz-buying service out of Crown Heights about a decade ago, an ever growing number of Jews-- 56,843 last year-- have pointed and clicked to give power of attorney over their chametz to Rabbi Yosef Landa, a Chabad rabbi in St. Louis

headline.main: An Orthodox, Online Version of the Deep-Freeze for Passover
